entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 01 May 2016
